Topographic Mapping(GIF Image, 1 × 1 pixels)
Topographic mapping is a routine task for solar plant design and construction projects. Visualise your solar plant project using high-resolution aerial data at the fraction of the time and cost of traditional methods. Using a combination of both aerial and ground-based methods, Above delivers a high-resolution map of the site including accurate elevation data.
Advantages of Above’s solution
Industry leading quality 
Our services are designed specifically for your project’s needs. 
Real-world accuracy 
Aerial flight routes are planned by our experienced team, ensuring sufficient row/column overlap. Using GPS-RTK to take ‘ground control’ points across the site to ensure real-world accuracy. 
Make informed decisions 
Design your solar plant with confidence using aerial topographic data to inform your design decisions 
Time and cost effective 
Aerial topographic mapping saves you time compared to traditional surveys and at a fraction of the cost 
Plan for the future 
Store a visual and spatial record of the land state before plant construction 
Deliverables
Orthomosaic
A highly accurate and detailed top-down 2D orthometric image of your entire site. Provided in
a geoTIFF format.
Digital Surface Model (DSM)
A full digital elevation model of your site showing the elevation of every pixel. A useful tool for
confirming terrain profiles.
Above Linework
Above provides linework of your site, including contours and labelled layers of important features. We can also perform ground-based surveying of specific features if required.
Examples of important features:
•Vegetation
•Water (lakes, rivers and ponds)
•Roads and tracks
•Power lines
•Buildings and structures
•Other obstacles that may be a potential source of shading or obstruction
Above Linework and orthomosaic details site features such as powerlines, vegetation and other potential obstructions. This example illustrates a combination of drone data and ground-based data.
Optional Deliverables
Panoramic imagery
Interactive panoramic images are a great tool to understand the context of your site and sources of potential far shading (e.g. mountains).
Summary report
Providing observations on-site regarding access, soil-type, potential hazards or obstructions.
Raw imagery and 3D project files
The raw imagery from the service and 3D projects files are available as an additional deliverable.
Explore our Aerial 3D modelling services in this video
(GIF Image, 1 × 1 pixels)

Solar inspection -Thermographic and High-Definition Inspection
Above pioneered the use of aerial thermography solar inspections and is still the industry leader today. We are known for our high quality and can detect thermal anomalies in solar PV modules down to a cellular level. Above’s thermographic and high-definition inspection is both a cost-effective and time-efficient solution to detect potential performance issues. Above holds patents that ensure our inspections give accurate and high-quality results. Our reporting platform SolarGain displays the inspection results through analytics dashboards, an interactive geospatial map, and a filterable anomaly list. Above is an expert in conducting thermographic solar inspections to meet IEC standards.
Advantages of Above's Thermographic & HD Inspection
Build an accurate baseline 
Regular solar inspections empower you to analyse and compare performance results over the asset's lifetime and across your entire portfolio. 
Standardise your solar inspection data 
Aerial imagery performed up to IEC TS 62446-3:2017 and meet best practice guidelines across your solar portfolio. 
Support warranty claims 
Start building a digital thread of historical data to help you understand the module failure rate. Having access to high-quality historical data can lead to a more successful warranty claim in the future. 
The highest-quality thermal data 
Above can capture an IEC-compliant thermal image of every module down to a cellular level. Our patented normalisation methodology enables us to collect the most accurate data available. Quality assurance is carried out by a level 1 thermographer to ISO 18436 standards whilst working with ISO 9001:2015 processes.
High-definition visual imagery 
Above collects high-definition imagery at the same time as thermal data collection for accurate and reliable visual root cause identification.
Bespoke platform for solar plant data 
SolarGain inspection reports are packed with data-rich information that gives you the ability to act on testing and inspection data. Collect, analyse, and visualise your inspection data all in one place. Prioritise your work by determining which assets are most critical to the overall health of your portfolio and understand the true status of each asset.
Compare historic inspection data 
Compare multiple inspection reports within a series of data visualisations. Understand the evolution of each module’s state and identify trends and correlations in your thermal data.
Interactive, real-time task lists 
Build targeted anomaly task lists from your latest Thermographic and HD Inspection report. Easily share tailored data sets with third-parties. Track the status of each anomaly’s resolution progress, allowing field teams to resolve anomalies and add root causes in the field.
Advanced power loss estimations 
Designed in collaboration with leading EU research centre C.R.E.S.T, this tool uniquely demonstrates the combined impact of module thermal anomalies on your solar plant. Using your electrical system design we provide an instant estimation of the yield and revenue loss associated with module thermal anomalies.
SolarGain Report Features
Portfolio Dashboard 
View Reports On Mobile 
Electrically and Spatially Mapped Data 
Advanced Anomaly Filtering 
Define Root Cause 
Anomaly Resolution Status 
This website uses cookies to give you the best experience. By continuing, you agree to our use of cookies. ACCEPT

Digital Construction Management
Digital Construction Management improves solar asset quality during construction, powered by different data types, both cloud-based and mobile.
While drone-based construction monitoring provides your team with bird’s eye insights, your team enriches, tracks, and controls the quality of construction from the ground using Above’s SolarGain mobile app. Our technology makes your team more productive and ensures a higher quality of solar assets.
Advantages of Digital Construction Management
Manage onsite construction tasks more efficiently 
Raise, track, and resolve onsite tasks using aerial intelligence alongside our mobile app while being in the office. 
Improve transparency and ease of reporting 
Track your project progress, record any deviations and report with ease. 
Spot any deviations from pre-build plant designs 
Ensure construction work follows pre-build CAD designs. Track and manage design change orders that arise during construction. 
Reduce the need for site visits 
Relying on Above’s forensic data collection approach allows you to manage construction more efficiently. 
Seamlessly transition into operational life 
Creating a digital plant record simplifies construction management and the transition to digital condition management. 
Benefit from digital plant records 
Increase plant value through building a digital plant record from construction to commissioning and benefit during asset management, technical due diligence, or asset transfer. 
Ensure construction work follows pre-build CAD designs. Track and manage design changes during construction for accurate as-built drawings.
Mobile Tools For Digital Construction Management 
SolarGain Mobile App
Track and control the quality of construction from the ground using the SolarGain Mobile application. Efficiently connect fieldwork and office-based construction supervision, also when working with third parties.
All Construction Management Data In One Place 
Regular drone-based construction monitoring provides precise high-level insights into the quantitative progress of construction and deviations from the construction design.
SolarGain Mobile allows your teams to track and control the quality of construction from the ground. Efficiently connect site and office-based workflows even when working with third parties.
With commissioning inspection tests and serial numbers precisely matched to physical components, this rich solar plant data record prepares your asset for a seamless transition into operational life.
This website uses cookies to give you the best experience. By continuing, you agree to our use of cookies. ACCEPT

Ultra-High-Definition Inspection
Inspect every module using ultra-high-definition aerial imagery of your asset. Above’s innovative solution allows you to accurately record each module’s state at a point in time. Take the opportunity to identify visual anomalies such as delamination and snail trails through our unique solar data analysis tool. Record visual anomalies straight to the precise module location within your SolarGain plant map. Our digital solutions allow asset operators to pin-point and process issues with greater accuracy.
Advantages of Above's UHD solution 
Whole system visibility 
Gain a comprehensive visual inspection of your solar plant to track module degradation and better evidence systemic warranty claims. 
Locate visual anomalies 
Identify visual anomalies such as delamination and snail trails from geo-located ultra-high-definition video capture 
Target onsite issues 
Improve overall maintenance and operations by targeting key resources directly to onsite issues that need attention 
SolarPlayer Tool 
Utilise the SolarPlayer tool to accurately identify and record visual anomalies to an accurate site map 
Minimise time, cost and risk 
Work more time-efficiently and cost-effectively whilst meeting increasingly complex health, safety and environmental requirements 
High-quality data capture 
An Above ultra-high-definition inspection captures accurate data at very low flying heights. The visual data is geo-referenced, allowing you to identify module anomalies and record them in their exact location.
Agile video playback tool designed 
for solar inspection data
Our unique SolarPlayer tool allows you to view your inspection data, identify visual anomalies and map their location within SolarGain. Providing your team with an interactive inspection and testing data platform to interrogate data.
SolarPlayer Map view 
SolarPlayer is synchronised with the ‘Map View’ of your site within SolarGain, allowing you to accurately record anomalies to their exact site location.
Video
Future-proofing your assets
Above have developed an innovative solution to visually inspect 100% of your solar plant’s modules.
Find out how Above is capturing the true visual state of each module to chart the rate of degradation.
This website uses cookies to give you the best experience. By continuing, you agree to our use of cookies. ACCEPT

SolarGain Mobile
Digitalise your entire workflow from planning site visits, tracking task histories, collecting data on-site, and reporting to stakeholders. Whether it’s visual inspections or serial number scanning, SolarGain mobile supports real-time collaboration at every stage of your solar plant’s lifecycle, enhancing efficiency and data quality.
By connecting all collected information to a geo-spatial, component-based map, SolarGain Mobile enables you to identify the exact location of any item, save it and report it within a couple of clicks. It’s the perfect tool to track where, when and by whom the data was collected – be it at construction, commissioning, or during operation.
SolarGain Mobile is a purpose-built tool that integrates with SolarGain.

About - Above
Power from Data
We have worked on over 5000 solar surveys and are supporting customers across six continents. We work with many of the world’s leading solar energy companies to deliver solar plant data and analytics through our interactive platform, SolarGain.

SolarGain
SolarGain Mobile, Above’s mobile solution for solar, optimises solar plant site visits.
Digitalise your entire workflow from planning site visits, tracking task histories, collecting data on-site, and reporting to stakeholders. Whether it’s visual inspections or serial number scanning, SolarGain mobile supports real-time collaboration at every stage of your solar plant’s lifecycle, enhancing efficiency and data quality.
By connecting all collected information to a geo-spatial, component-based map, SolarGain Mobile enables you to identify the exact location of any item, save it and report it within a couple of clicks. It’s the perfect tool to track where, when and by whom the data was collected – be it at construction, commissioning, or during operation.
SolarGain Mobile is a purpose-built tool for solar that integrates seamlessly with SolarGain. Learn more about SolarGain Mobile.

Careers at Above
About Above
We have worked on over 5000 solar surveys and are supporting customers across six continents. We work with many of the world’s leading solar energy companies to deliver solar plant data and analytics through our interactive platform, SolarGain.
Join our Team
Flexibility
Remote, hybrid or in-office working, based on role and personal preference. 
Grow with us
We help you to constantly develop, improve and learn new skills. 
Office Perks
Regular team building activities and social events virtually and in person. 
Work that matters
What we do makes a difference. We are at the forefront of the digital transformation of the solar industry, enabling solar companies to expand solar PVs potential with data analytics, mobile apps, drones and AI.
Make an impact
We create and develop transformative digital solutions for world-leading solar companies. 
Passionate about customers
Our industry-leading solutions make it easier for our customers to design, build and manage solar better. 
Build trust
We shape long-lasting partnerships within the industry to make a positive difference. 
Company collaboration
We leverage our skills across the company to work together towards a shared vision. 
Be curious
We are constantly innovating to keep the company moving forwards. If you have an idea or a solution we want you to explore it. 
Work with meaning
Our focus is solar. We strive to continuously improve our impact on an industry that will help combat the climate crisis.

A review of snail trails 
As solar assets in the UK begin to age, we are receiving an increasing number of reports of ‘snail trails’ developing on photovoltaic (PV) modules, across many solar farms.
Determination of Potential-induced Degradation (PID) Using Aerial Thermography
In recent years, potential-induced degradation (PID) has been one of the most detrimental
problems for Photovoltaic (PV) modules operating in the field. It degrades the power output of PV modules and reduces the performance ratio (PR) of solarplants.

Above and DroneDeploy Partner to Revolutionise Solar Plant Management with Advanced Dock Drone Automation and Intelligence
08/10/2024
[London, 08/10/24] – Above, a leader in solar intelligence solutions, and DroneDeploy, the leading aerial and ground reality capture platform, are excited to announce a strategic partnership aimed at transforming solar plant management. This collaboration brings together Above’s industry-leading SolarGain platform and DroneDeploy’s state-of-the-art reality capture platform to deliver comprehensive solutions across the entire lifecycle of solar plants, from project planning and construction to commissioning and long-term operation.
Automation Meets Intelligence: A New Era of Solar Management
By integrating DroneDeploy’s automation capabilities with Above’s component-level intelligence, solar asset managers and builders can now benefit from the latest in docked drone technology to enable consistent, high-accuracy data capture and analysis while realising significant cost efficiencies. This partnership allows users to streamline site inspections, monitor construction progress, and optimise operational efficiency through a seamless, integrated platform.
Key Benefits of the Partnership:
Automated Data Capture: Utilising DroneDeploy’s best-in-class Dock Automation solution and supported by its robust network of professional pilots, DroneDeploy enables reliable, automated aerial inspections. With support for RTK, PPK, and GCPs, the platform ensures high-accuracy mapping and 3D photogrammetry, delivering the most precise data available.
Enhanced Site Management: Above’s SolarGain platform enables users to manage progress and quality throughout the construction phase, with fast and accurate progress reporting and annotation tools that are fully integrated with mobile devices for on-the-go access.
Digital Twin Technology for Commissioning: Experience the fastest and most accurate serial number scanning process with Above’s Digital Twin technology, allowing users to quickly resolve all open “punch list” items and complete project commissioning efficiently.
Long-Term Condition Monitoring: Leverage Above’s component-level intelligence for ongoing condition monitoring of solar plants, ensuring assets are maintained in optimal condition throughout their lifecycle.
Systems Integration: The partnership offers robust integration capabilities, including API connections to internal task management systems and SCADA integrations, providing a cohesive, end-to-end solution for solar plant management.
Empowering Solar Asset Managers
“By combining our expertise with DroneDeploy’s innovative automation technology, we are setting a new standard in solar plant management,” said Peregrine Fraser, Chief Commercial Officer at Above. “This partnership enables our customers to make data-driven decisions with unprecedented speed and accuracy, maximising the efficiency and lifespan of their solar assets.”
“Partnering with Above allows us to deliver a comprehensive solution that combines the best of automation and intelligence,” said James Pipe, Chief Product Officer at DroneDeploy “Together, we’re providing solar asset managers with the tools they need to streamline operations and drive success at every stage of the solar plant lifecycle.”
For more information about the Above and DroneDeploy partnership, visit www.abovesurveying.com and www.dronedeploy.com.
About Above 
In 2016 Above pioneered the use of aerial inspection techniques in utility-scale solar and catalysed an industry. It then went on to introduce the concept of the digital twin to address the challenges of managing larger solar assets and portfolios. Above is now at the forefront of a digital revolution within the rapidly growing solar industry. For more information, please visit: https://www.abovesurveying.com/
Build with certainty, operate with confidence. That’s why thousands of construction, and energy companies use DroneDeploy on a daily basis. We help them automate reality capture using drones, robots and 360 cameras – combining this data in one platform for AI-powered analysis. From aerial and ground views of construction progress to automated gauge readings and methane leak detection, DroneDeploy is shaping the future of reality capture.
To learn more, visit www.dronedeploy.com, join the conversation on LinkedIn, YouTube, Instagram and X, and subscribe to DroneDeploy Insider, your premium content hub for reality capture education and entertainment.

Ensuring Quality Control from Factory to Field (and the table): Protecting Against Technology Risks in Module Manufacturing
28/08/2024
As the renewables industry experiences rapid growth and advancements in module manufacturing, the introduction of new factories, manufacturing processes and technologies presents an inherent quality risk. To mitigate this risk, it is crucial to implement robust quality assurance (QA) measures from the factory to the field.
Pre-shipment testing
One effective method to safeguard against quality risks is to conduct factory-to-field module QA. This involves the monitoring of modules at key manufacturing and testing stages within the factory, which helps to oversee the entire production run. This can include monitoring the bill of material control, ensuring proper packaging, and supervising the dispatch of the modules to their destination.
Validating Modules Upon Arrival
Once the modules arrive at their destination, it is essential to verify that they have not sustained any damage during transit. Some of our clients employ inertia sensors in the containers, which activate if the container experiences a shock through mishandling at any point. This precaution helps in identifying potential impacts during transportation and therefore a more thorough testing on site before being distributed in the field.
Post-shipment Testing
To further ensure the integrity of the modules, many clients conduct post-shipment testing. This process involves opening the container, removing a pallet, and performing electroluminescence testing on a sample of the modules to identify any cell cracks. This step is crucial to ensure that the modules received on site are in the same condition as when they left the factory. It is also vital to confirm that the modules that left the factory are indeed the same ones that arrived at the site!
Once the modules are mounted and the solar plant energised, the installed modules can be scanned using aerial thermography as a final test to identify any damage caused by distribution and mounting on the tables.
Traceability and Accountability
Maintaining traceability is vital throughout these stages and can only really be delivered via a digital twin of the solar plant. Once the module serial numbers have been scanned into the digital twin and the factory test and delivery data uploaded, a forensic level of traceability is possible.
Conclusion
In conclusion, implementing comprehensive factory-to-field QA measures is essential in mitigating quality risks associated with new module manufacturing. By overseeing the entire production run, validating module integrity upon arrival, and maintaining traceability, it’s possible to ensure the quality and reliability of the modules from factory to field, and to the table. These practices not only protect investments but also enhance the overall efficiency and success of solar projects.

Module Warranty Claiming - Addressing the Urgent Need for Condition Monitoring in Aging Solar Assets
07/08/2024
As solar assets continue to age, many batches of modules are nearing the end of their product warranty periods. This poses a significant challenge for solar asset owners: proving product failure in order to secure high-volume batch claims from module manufacturers. The key to a successful claim lies in demonstrating evidence of module degradation over time. This evidence is crucial for substantiating that the failure is related to an entire batch of solar modules. However, gathering this evidence retrospectively is nearly impossible once the product warranty is about to expire. 
Above has observed a growing trend where product warranties expire before claims are even initiated or completed (it’s false security thinking that the performance warranty period will provide sufficient protection following the expiry of the product element). This is a concerning issue for asset owners, as the signs of product failure—particularly backsheet degradation — were often visible years prior. Early indicators of backsheet failure, such as yellowing and chalking, can manifest long before the backsheet itself fails. This process takes time, but once it starts, the outcome is predictable. 
Given this scenario, we strongly advocate for the implementation of robust condition monitoring as part of the preventative maintenance measures delivered by the O&M team. By conducting regular inspections and capturing data over time, asset owners can monitor state changes and gather the necessary evidence to support warranty claims.
The tools for effective condition monitoring are precisely what Above Surveying has developed and introduced to the market over the past few years. Our SolarGain platform, a digital twin solution, is designed to capture and store inspection data in a usable form. This platform allows for detailed tracking of component state change over time and facilitates robust warranty claims by providing a clear historical record of module condition. 
While some Product warranties may have already expired, leaving no recourse for claims, this is not the end of the story. It is vital that the industry learns from what’s happening and puts in place the right tools to prevent a similar outcome for the younger assets. At Above, we are committed to helping our clients protect their investments. 
We recommend integrating our SolarGain platform and mobile tools into your inspection routines. This approach ensures that data is recorded in a traceable manner, linked to specific components and batches, thereby strengthening any future warranty claims. 
By proactively embracing condition monitoring and using advanced data recording techniques, solar asset owners can safeguard against premature warranty expirations and ensure their claims are backed by solid evidence. Don’t wait until it’s too late—start implementing these practices today to protect your solar investments for the future. 
For more information on how Above Surveying can support your solar asset management, please contact us here.

Topographische Luftbildkartierung
Die topographische Vermessung ist eine Routineaufgabe bei der Planung und dem Bau von Solaranlagen. Aboves Vermessungsdienstleistung per Drohne erfasst hochauflösende 3D-Daten zu einem Bruchteil der Zeit und Kosten herkömmlicher Methoden. Unter Verwendung einer Kombination von Drohnen- als auch bodengestützten Methoden liefert Above eine hochauflösende Karte des Standortes einschließlich genauer Höhendaten.
Visualisieren Sie Ihr Solaranlagenprojekt mit hochauflösenden Luftaufnahmen
Marktführende Qualität 
Unsere Dienstleistungen sind speziell auf die Bedürfnisse Ihres Projekts zugeschnitten. 
Präzision 
Die Flugrouten werden von unserem erfahrenen Team geplant. Wir verwenden GPS-RTK, um Bodenkontrollpunkte auf dem gesamten Gelände aufzunehmen, um Präzision zu gewährleisten. 
Informierte Entscheidungen treffen 
Entwerfen Sie Ihre Solaranlage auf Grundlage von hochauflösenden 3D-Daten und treffen Sie damit bessere Entscheidungen. 
Zeit- und kostengünstig 
Die topografische Luftbildkartierung spart Ihnen im Vergleich zu herkömmlichen Vermessungen Zeit und stellt nur einen Bruchteil der Kosten dar. 
Plan für die Zukunft 
Speichern einer visuellen und räumlichen Aufzeichnung des Zustands des Gebietes vor dem Bau der Anlage 
Ergebnisse für Sie
Orthofoto-Karte
Ein hochpräzises und detailliertes orthometrisches 2D-Bild Ihrer gesamten Bauffläche. Zur Verfügung gestellt im geoTIFF-Format.
Digitales Oberflächenmodell (DSM)
Ein vollständiges digitales Höhenmodell des Gebietes, das die Höhe jedes Pixels anzeigt. Ein nützliches Werkzeug für die Analyse von Geländeprofilen.
Above Darstellung der CAD Zeichnung
Above zeigt die CAD Zeichnung Ihrer Anlage, einschließlich Konturen und Beschriftungen wichtiger Merkmale. Bei Bedarf können wir auch bodengestützte Vermessungen spezifischer Merkmale durchführen.
Beispiele für wichtige Merkmale:
-Vegetation
-Wasser (Seen, Flüsse und Teiche)
-Straßen und Schienen
-Stromleitungen
-Gebäude und Strukturen
-andere Hindernisse, die eine potentielle Quelle von Verschattung oder Hemmnissen darstellen können
Above CAD Zeichnung und des Orthofotos zeigen Merkmale der zukünftigen Baufläche wie Stromleitungen, Vegetation und andere potenzielle Hindernisse auf. Dieses Beispiel veranschaulicht eine Kombination von Drohnendaten und bodengestützten Daten.
Optionale Ergebnisse für Sie
Panorama-Bilder
Interaktive Panoramabilder sind ein großartiges Hilfsmittel, um die Umgebung zukünftigen Solaranlage und potentielle Fernverschattungen (z.B. Berge) zu verstehen.
Zusammenfassender Bericht
Bereitstellung von Beobachtungen vor Ort hinsichtlich Zugang, Bodenart, potentieller Gefahren oder sonstigen Hindernissen.
Albedo-Schätzungen
Bereitstellung von Albedo-Faktoren über den gesamten Standort für die Modellierung bifazialer Erträge.
Rohbilder und 3D-Projektdateien
Die Rohdaten sind als zusätzliche Leistung erhältlich.
Entdecken Sie unseren 3D-Luftbildmodellierungsdienste in diesem Video

Mappatura topografica con drone
La mappatura topografica è una procedura abituale per la progettazione e la costruzione degli impianti solari. Il servizio di mappatura topografica con drone fornito da Above acquisisce dati 3D ad alta risoluzione in una frazione di tempo e di costo dei metodi tradizionali. Combinando i metodi da terra con quelli aerei, Above fornisce una mappa ad alta risoluzione del sito che include accurati dati altimetrici.
Visualizza il progetto del tuo impianto solare utilizzando dati aerei ad alta risoluzione
Leader nel settore per qualità 
I nostri servizi sono studiati appositamente per le esigenze del tuo progetto. 
Precisione nel mondo reale 
Le rotte dei voli aerei sono pianificate dal nostro team di esperti. Utilizziamo il GPS-RTK prendendo i punti di "controllo a terra" su tutto il sito per garantire un’assoluta precisione con i dati reali. 
Prendere decisioni informate 
Progetta il tuo impianto solare con fiducia utilizzando dati 3D ad alta risoluzione per supportare le tue decisioni di progettazione. 
Tempo e convenienza economica 
La mappatura topografica aerea consente di risparmiare tempo rispetto ai rilievi tradizionali e ad una frazione del costo. 
Pianificare il futuro 
Memorizza una registrazione visiva e spaziale dello stato del terreno prima della costruzione dell'impianto. 
Risultato finale
Ortomosaico geo-referenziato
Un’immagine 2D altamente accurata e dettagliata dell’intero sito. Fornito con un formato geoTIFF.
Modello digitale della superficie (DSM)
Un modello digitale di elevazione completo del tuo sito che mostra l’elevazione di ogni pixel. Uno strumento utile per confermare i profili del terreno.
Above linee guida
Above fornisce le linee guida del tuo sito, compreso il perimetro e le caratteristiche importanti degli strati. Se necessario, possiamo anche eseguire rilievi a terra di caratteristiche specifiche.
Esempi di caratteristiche importanti:
Vegetazione
Acqua (laghi, fiumi e stagni)
Strade e binari
Linee elettriche
Edifici e strutture
Altri ostacoli che possono essere una potenziale fonte di ombreggiamento o di ostruzione
Le linee guida e l’ortomosaico forniti da Above garantiscono l’individuazione di importanti caratteristiche nel sito come linee elettriche, vegetazione e altre potenziali ostruzioni. Questo esempio illustra una combinazione di dati ottenuti con il drone con quelli prelevati a terra.
Dati opzionali
Immagini panoramiche
Le immagini panoramiche interattive sono un ottimo strumento per capire il contesto del tuo sito e le fonti di potenziali lontani ombreggiamenti (ad esempio le montagne).
Rapporto di sintesi
Fornire osservazioni in loco per quanto riguarda l’accesso, il tipo di terreno, i potenziali pericoli o gli ostacoli.
Stime di albedo
Fornire fattori di albedo in tutto il sito per la modellazione bifacciale del rendimento.
Immagini grezze e file di progetto 3D
Le immagini grezze del servizio e i file dei progetti 3D sono disponibili come risultato finale aggiuntivo.
Video
Esplora i nostri servizi di modellazione aerea 3D in questo video

Cartografía topográfica aérea
La cartografía topográfica es una tarea rutinaria en el diseño de plantas solares y proyectos de construcción. El servicio de cartografía topográfica aérea de Above captura datos en 3D de alta resolución en una fracción del tiempo y el coste de los métodos tradicionales. Utilizando una combinación de métodos aéreos y terrestres, Above entrega un mapa de alta resolución del proyecto que incluye datos precisos de elevación.
Visualice su proyecto solar utilizando datos aéreos de alta resolución
Líder de calidad en la industria 
Visualice su proyecto solar utilizando datos aéreos de alta resolución 
Precisión real 
Las rutas de vuelo aéreo son planificadas por nuestro experimentado equipo. Usamos GPS-RTK para tomar puntos de "control en el terreno" en la localización del proyecto para asegurar una precisión realista. 
Tome decisiones basadas en datos reales 
Diseñe su planta solar con seguridad, utilizando datos 3D de alta resolución para determinar sus decisiones. 
Efectividad en términos de tiempo y coste 
La cartografía topográfica aérea le ahorra tiempo en comparación con los estudios tradicionales y a una fracción del coste. 
Planifica para el futuro 
Almacene un registro visual y espacial del estado del terreno previo al comienzo de la construcción. 
Entregables
Mapa del orto-mosaico
Una imagen orto-métrica 2D, de alta precisión y detallada, de todo su proyecto. Proporcionada en un formato geoTIFF.
Modelo digital de superficie
Un modelo digital de la elevación de su proyecto que muestra la elevación de cada píxel. Una herramienta útil para confirmar los perfiles del terreno.
Above Linework
Above provee contornos y capas etiquetadas de las características importantes. También podemos realizar estudios terrestres de características específicas si es necesario.
Ejemplos de características importantes:
-Vegetación
-Agua (lagos, ríos y estanques)
-Caminos y pistas
-cables de alta tensión
-Edificios y estructuras
-Otros obstáculos que pueden ser una fuente potencial de sombreado u obstrucción
El ‘Linework’ de Above y los detalles orto-mosaicos del proyecto muestran características tales como líneas eléctricas, vegetación y otras posibles obstrucciones. Este ejemplo ilustra una combinación de datos obtenidos vía drones y datos terrestres.
Productos opcionales
Imágenes panorámicas
Las imágenes panorámicas interactivas son una gran herramienta para comprender el contexto de su proyecto y las fuentes de posible sombreado lejano (por ejemplo, las montañas).
Resumen de informe
Proporciona observaciones in situ sobre el acceso, el tipo de suelo, los posibles peligros u obstrucciones.
Estimaciones de Albedo
Proporcionar factores de albedo en toda la localización del proyecto para fines de modelización del rendimiento bifacial
Imágenes en bruto y archivos de proyectos 3D
Las imágenes en bruto del servicio y los archivos de los proyectos 3D están disponibles como un material de entrega adicional.

Topographic Mapping
Mapeamento Topográfico Aéreo 
O mapeamento topográfico, é uma tarefa essencial durante a fase de conceção de uma central fotovoltaica. O serviço topográfico da Above, permite a visualização do projeto fotovoltaico através da recolha aérea, de dados, numa fração do tempo e de custo quando comparado com os métodos tradicionais. Ao combinar métodos aéreos e terrestres, a Above apresenta um mapa de alta resolução do projeto incluindo dados precisos de elevação.
Vantagens da solução Above
Qualidade Líder na industria 
Os nossos serviços são concebidos especificamente para as necessidades do seu projeto 
Precisão Real 
As rotas de voo são previamente planeadas pela nossa experiente equipa. Ao utilizar GPS-RTK, identificamos pontos de “controlo em terra” para assegurar precisão real. 
Tome decisões fundamentas 
Desenhe com confiança a sua central fotovoltaica utilizando dados topográficos aéreos de alta resolução. 
Eficiência de tempo e custo 
O Mapeamento topográfico aéreo permite uma poupança significativa em termos de tempo e de custo quando comparado com métodos tradicionais. 
Planear o Futuro 
Armazene um registo visual e espacial do estado do terreno antes da construção. 
O que entregamos:
Mapa Ortomosaico
Uma imagem ortométrica 2D altamente precisa e detalhada de todo-o-terreno, em formato geoTIFF.
Modelo Digital de Superfície
Um modelo digital da elevação do terreno, que mostra a elevação de cada pixel. Útil para confirmar os perfis de terreno.
O “linework” da Above
Above fornece contornos e camadas rotuladas das características importantes do terreno. Se necessário, podemos ainda realizar estudos terrestres específicos.
Exemplos de características importantes:
– Vegetação
– Água (lagos, rios e lagoas)
– Estradas e trilhos
– Linhas de Alta-Tensão
– Edifícios e estruturas
– Outros obstáculos que podem ser fontes potenciais de sombreamento ou obstrução.
O “Linework” da Above e o ortomosaico criado, detalham características importantes do terreno, como linhas de Alta-Tensão, vegetação e outras potenciais obstruções. Este exemplo, ilustra uma combinação de dados recolhidos via aérea (drones) e terrestre.)
Serviços Opcionais
Imagem Panorâmica
As imagens panorâmicas interativas são uma ferramenta útil para compreender o contexto do terreno e fontes potenciais de sombra distantes (por exemplo, montanhas).
Relatório resumo
O relatório providencia observações do local relativas a acessos, características do solo, potenciais perigos ou obstruções.
Imagens em bruto e ficheiros 3D
As imagens em bruto e os ficheiros 3D estão disponíveis como um produto adicional

Cartographie topographique aérienne
La cartographie topographique est une tâche de routine pour les centrales solaires en phase de conception et de construction. Le service de cartographie topographique aérienne d’Above saisit des données 3D à haute résolution en une fraction du temps et du coût des méthodes traditionnelles. En utilisant une combinaison de méthodes aériennes et terrestres, Above fournit un plan du site de haute qualité comprenant des données d’élévation précises.Visualisez votre centrale solaire à l’aide de données aériennes à haute résolution
Avantages de Above solutions
Une qualité de pointe 
Nos services sont conçus spécifiquement pour les besoins de votre projet. 
Précision du monde réel 
Les itinéraires des vols aériens sont planifiés par notre équipe expérimentée. Nous utilisons le GPS-RTK pour prendre des points de contrôle au sol à travers le site afin de garantir une précision réelle. 
Prendre des décisions en connaissance de cause 
Concevez votre centrale solaire en toute confiance en utilisant des données 3D haute résolution pour vous aider à prendre des décisions de conception 
Temps et rentabilité 
La cartographie topographique aérienne vous permet de gagner du temps par rapport aux levés traditionnels, à une fraction du coût seulement. 
Information pour l'avenir 
Conservez de l’information visuel et spatial de l'état du terrain avant la construction de votre centrale. 
Produits livrables
Plan orthomosaïque
Une image orthométrique 2D précise et détaillée de l’ensemble de votre site. Fournie en format geoTIFF.
Modèle numérique de surface (MNS)
Un modèle d’élévation numérique complet de votre site montrant l’élévation de chaque pixel. Un outil très utile pour la confirmation des profils de terrain.
Présentation de l’information
Above vous fournit les lignes mesurées de votre site, y compris les contours et les couches étiquetées des parties importantes de la centrale. Nous pouvons également effectuer des levés au sol d’éléments spécifiques si nécessaire.
Exemples d’éléments importants :
-Végétation
-Eau (lacs, rivières et étangs)
-Routes et pistes
-Lignes électriques
-Bâtiments et structures
-Autres obstacles pouvant être une source potentielle d’ombre ou d’obstruction
Les lignes mesurées par Above et l’image orthomosaïque mette en évidence les éléments du site tels que les lignes électriques, la végétation et d’autres obstructions potentiels. Cet exemple illustre une combinaison de données de drones et de données au sol.
Produits livrables optionnels
Imagerie panoramique
Les images panoramiques interactives sont un excellent outil pour comprendre le contexte de votre site et les potentielles sources d’ombres lointaines (par exemple, les montagnes).
Rapport de synthèse
Fournir des observations sur place concernant l’accès, le type de sol, les dangers potentiels ou les obstructions.
Estimations de l’albédo
Fournir des facteurs d’albédo sur l’ensemble du site à des fins de modélisation du rendement des panneaux solaires a double face.
Images brutes et fichiers de projets 3D
L’imagerie brute du service et les fichiers de projets 3D sont disponibles comme produit supplémentaire.
Produits livrables optionnels
Imagerie panoramique
Les images panoramiques interactives sont un excellent outil pour comprendre le contexte de votre site et les potentielles sources d’ombres lointaines (par exemple, les montagnes).

Ispezione termografica e ispezione ad alta definizione
Above è stato il pioniere dell’uso della termografia aerea nell’industria solare ed è ancora oggi il leader del settore. Above è nota per l’attenzione nei dettagli ed è in grado di rilevare anomalie termiche nei moduli fotovoltaici fino a livello di cella. Le termografie e le ispezioni visive ad alta definizione di Above sono delle soluzioni efficienti in termini di costi e di tempo per rilevare potenziali problemi di prestazioni. Above detenendo specifici brevetti garantisce che le ispezioni forniscano risultati accurati e di alta qualità. La piattaforma SolarGain consente di visualizzare i risultati delle ispezioni all’interno di una dashboard, di una mappa geo-spaziale interattiva o attraverso un elenco di anomalie filtrabili.
Una visione completa della salute degli asset fino a livello di cella
Costruire una base accurata 
Le ispezioni termografiche effettuate regolarmente da Above consentono di analizzare e confrontare i risultati delle prestazioni per tutta la durata della vita dell'asset e sull'intero portafoglio. 
Omologare i vostri dati 
Immagini aeree eseguite secondo gli standard IEC e le migliori linee guida a supporto del vostro intero portafoglio. 
Supportare le richieste di garanzia 
Inizia a creare una storicità dei dati per aiutarti a capire la percentuale di guasto nei moduli. Avere accesso a dati storici di alta qualità può aiutarti ad avere successo durante la fase di richiesta di garanzia. 
Mappatura elettrica e spaziale 
I tuoi dati ottenuti dalle ispezioni aeree sono mappati elettricamente e spazialmente nel punto esatto della piattaforma SolarGain. 
Il modello riguardante la perdita di potenza più avanzato nel settore 
Progettato in collaborazione con il principale centro di ricerca accademico C.R.E.S.T., questo strumento dimostra in modo unico l'impatto combinato delle anomalie termiche sui moduli utilizzando il progetto del tuo impianto elettrico. 
Crea task di lavoro direttamente dai tuoi report 
Crea e condivi facilmente con gli appaltatori un elenco di task direttamente dal report delle termografie all’interno del SolarGain. 
Confronta i report storici 
Confrontare più rapporti di ispezione all'interno di una serie di visualizzazioni di dati. Il nostro strumento intelligente collega i punti tra i vostri dati rilasciando tempo prezioso per identificare le anomalie termiche persistenti e in evoluzione. 
Acquisizione di dati ad alta qualità
Above può catturare immagini ad alta definizione conformi agli standard IEC e immagini termiche di ogni modulo fino a livello di cella. La nostra metodologia di normalizzazione è stata brevettata e ci permette di raccogliere i dati disponibili in modo più accurato. La qualità è assicurata dall’utilizzo di un termografo di livello 1 secondo gli standard ISO 18436 mentre lavora secondo i processi ISO 9001:2015.
Fotografia panoramica del tuo sito
Ad ogni ispezione, catturiamo una fotografia aerea del sito che può essere utilizzata nei materiali di marketing e come modo per identificare il sito.
SolarGain Risultati della termografia
I risultati delle ispezioni all’interno di SolarGain sono ricchi di informazioni e contenuti che ti danno la possibilità di utilizzarli insieme ad altri dati rilevati con altri test.
Risultati all’interno di SolarGain 
La nostra piattaforma SolarGain è la piattaforma leader nel settore fornendo report riguardanti le ispezioni aeree. SolarGain conserva i dati delle ispezione e altri test all’interno di una piattaforma unificata offrendo una visione globale della salute del tuo impianto. SolarGain ti dà accesso a informazioni utili per capire come sta performando il tuo asset. Ti permette di correlare e trasformare i dati delle ispezioni e dei test per prendere decisioni accurate.

Thermografische und hochauflösende Inspektion
Above leistete Pionierarbeit in der Luftthermografie in der Solarindustrie und ist heute Marktführer. Above ist bekannt für seine Detailgenauigkeit und kann thermische Anomalien in PV-Solarmodulen bis zur zellulären Ebene erkennen. Aboves thermografische und visuell hochauflösende Inspektion ist eine kosten- und zeiteffiziente Lösung zur Erkennung potenzieller Leistungsprobleme. Above hält Patente, die sicherstellen, dass unsere Inspektionen genaue und qualitativ hochwertige Ergebnisse liefern. Unsere Kundenplattform SolarGain zeigt die Inspektionsergebnisse in einem Übersichts-Dashboard, einer interaktiven Anlagen-Landkarte und einer filterbaren Anomalienliste an.
Eine umfassende Ansicht des Anlagenzustands bis hin zur Zellebene
Erstellen einer genauen Vergleichsbasis 
Regelmäßige thermografische Inspektionen durch Above ermöglichen Ihnen die Analyse und den Vergleich von Performance-Ergebnissen über die Lebensdauer der Anlage und über Ihr gesamtes Portfolio hinweg. 
Standardisieren Sie Ihre Daten 
Luftbilder, die den IEC-Normen und Best-Practice-Richtlinien für Ihr gesamtes Solarportfolio entsprechen. 
Unterstützung bei Garantieansprüchen 
Beginnen Sie mit dem Aufbau eines digitalen Pfads aus historischen Daten, um die Ausfallrate der Module zu verstehen. Der Zugriff auf qualitativ hochwertige historische Daten kann zu einem erfolgreicheren Garantieanspruch in der Zukunft führen. 
Elektrisch und räumlich abgebildet 
Ihre Luftbild-Inspektionsdaten werden in SolarGain elektrisch und räumlich am exakten Standort abgebildet. 
Das fortschrittlichste Leistungsverlustmodell der Branche 
Dieses Tool, das in Zusammenarbeit mit dem führenden akademischen Forschungszentrum C.R.E.S.T. entwickelt wurde, demonstriert auf einzigartige Weise die kombinierten Auswirkungen thermischer Modulanomalien anhand der elektrischen Architektur Ihrer Anlage. 
Erstellen von Mängellisten aus Ihren Berichten 
Erstellen Sie mit wenigen Klicks direkt in Ihrem SolarGain-Thermografiebericht eine Liste mit umsetzbaren Aufgaben und geben Sie diese an Auftragnehmer weiter. 
Historische Berichte vergleichen 
Vergleichen Sie mehrere Inspektionsberichte innerhalb einer Reihe von Datenvisualisierungen. Unser intelligentes Tool verbindet die Punkte zwischen Ihren Daten und setzt so wertvolle Ressourcenzeit frei, um anhaltende und sich entwickelnde thermische Anomalien zu identifizieren. 
Qualitativ hochwertige Datenerfassung
Above erfasst IEC-konforme, hochauflösende Bilder und Wärmebilder von jedem Modul bis hin zur Zellebene. Unsere patentierte Normalisierungsmethode ermöglicht es uns, die besten verfügbaren Daten zu sammeln. Die Qualitätssicherung wird von Thermographen der Stufe 1 gemäß ISO 18436-Normen durchgeführt unterstützt durch ISO 9001:2015-Prozesse.
Luftbilddarstellung
Bei jeder Inspektion machen wir eine Luftaufnahme des Standorts, die Sie für Marketingmaterialien und zur Identifizierung des Standorts verwenden können.
SolarGain Thermografie-Bericht SolarGain Inspektionsberichte sind voll von Informationen, die Ihnen die Möglichkeit geben, auf Test- und Inspektionsdaten zu reagieren.
SolarGain-Berichte
Unsere Kundenplattform SolarGain ist eine branchenführende Plattform, die intelligente Drohneninspektionsberichte liefert. SolarGain enthält Inspektions- und Testdaten innerhalb einer Plattform, die einen ganzheitlichen Überblick über den Zustand Ihrer Anlagen bietet. SolarGain bietet Ihnen Zugang zu Einblicken in die Leistung Ihrer Anlage, mit denen Sie handeln können. So können Sie Inspektions- und Testdaten korrelieren und in fundierte Entscheidungen umwandeln.
SolarGain Pro
Unsere Kundenplattform SolarGain ist eine branchenführende Plattform, die intelligente Inspektionsberichte aus der Luft liefert. SolarGain Pro ist eine Abonnementstufe, die in Ihr aktuelles Software-Ökosystem passt und Ihre Inspektions- und Testdaten in einem echten digitalen Modell Ihrer Anlage hält.

Thermographic and High Definition Inspection
Thermographic and High Definition Inspection
Above a été le pionnier de l’utilisation de la thermographie aérienne dans l’industrie solaire et est encore aujourd’hui le leader du secteur. Above est connu pour son souci du détail et peut détecter des anomalies thermiques des panneaux solaires photovoltaïques jusqu’au niveau cellulaire. La haute définition thermographique et visuelle d’Above est une solution rentable et rapide pour détecter les problèmes potentiels de performance. Above détient des brevets qui garantissent que nos inspections donnent des résultats précis et de haute qualité. Notre plate-forme client SolarGain affiche les résultats des inspections dans un tableau de bord, un plan géospatial interactif et une liste d’anomalies filtrable. Une vue globale de la santé des actifs jusqu’au niveau cellulaire
Avantages de Above 
Établir une base de référence précise 
Les inspections thermographiques régulières d’Above vous permettent d'analyser et de comparer les résultats de performance sur la durée de vie de l'actif et sur l'ensemble de votre portefeuille. 
Standardisez vos données 
L'imagerie aérienne est conforme aux normes IEC et aux directives de meilleures pratiques du secteur solaire. 
Soutenir les réclamations de garantie 
Commencez à construire un fil numérique de données historiques pour vous aider à comprendre le taux d'échec des panneaux de votre site. Avoir accès à des données historiques de haute qualité peut vous permettre d'obtenir plus facilement une garantie à l'avenir. 
Cartographie électrique et spatiale 
Vos données d'inspection aérienne sont représentées électriquement et geographiquement à l'emplacement exact dans la plate-forme SolarGain. 
Le modèle de perte de puissance le plus avancé du secteur 
Conçu en collaboration avec le centre de recherche universitaire de premier plan C.R.E.S.T, cet outil démontre de manière unique l'impact combiné des anomalies thermiques des modules en utilisant la conception de votre système électrique. 
Créez des listes de taches à partir de vos rapports 
Créez et partagez facilement une liste de tâches réalisables avec les entrepreneurs directement à partir de votre rapport thermographique SolarGain. 
Créez des listes de taches à partir de vos rapports 
Créez et partagez facilement une liste de tâches réalisables avec les entrepreneurs directement à partir de votre rapport thermographique SolarGain. 
Saisie de données de haute qualité
Above peut capturer une image haute définition et une image thermique conforme au standard IEC de chaque panneau jusqu’au niveau cellulaire. Notre méthodologie de normalisation brevetée nous permet de recueillir les données les plus précises possibles. L’assurance qualité est effectuée par un thermographe de niveau 1 selon les normes ISO 18436 tout en travaillant avec les processus ISO 9001:2015.
Image de l’ensemble de l’actif
Lors de chaque inspection, nous prenons une photographie aérienne du site qui peut être utilisée dans des documents marketing et comme moyen d’identifier le site.
Rapport thermographique SolarGain
Les rapports d’inspection de SolarGain sont riches en informations, ce qui vous permet d’agir en fonction des données d’analyse et d’inspection.
SolarGain Pro
Notre plate-forme client SolarGain est une plate-forme de pointe qui fournit des rapports intelligents d’inspection aérienne. SolarGain conserve les données d’inspection et de test au sein d’une plate-forme unifiée qui fournit une vue globale de la santé de votre actif. SolarGain vous donne accès à de l’information exploitable sur la performance de votre actif. SolarGain vous permet de corréler et de transformer les données d’inspection et de test en décisions éclairées.

Solar inspection -Thermographic and High-Definition Inspection
Inspeção Termográfica e de Alta-Definição (HD) 
A Above, foi pioneira na realização de inspeções a centrais fotovoltaicas através de termografias aéreas e ainda hoje é líder da indústria. Somos conhecidos pela nossa qualidade técnica e podemos detetar anomalias térmicas em módulos solares fotovoltaicos a um nível celular. A inspeção Termográfica e de Alta-Definição (HD) realizada pela Above é uma solução rentável e eficiente para detetar potenciais problemas de desempenho. A Above detém patentes que garantem que as nossas inspeções dão resultados precisos e de alta qualidade. A nossa plataforma, SolarGain, exibe os resultados da inspeção através de Dashboards de análise, um mapa geo-espacial interativo, e uma lista de anomalias filtráveis. A Above é perita na realização de inspeções solares termográficas para cumprir as normas IEC.
As vantagens da Inspeção Termográfica e de Alta-Definição da Above.
Precisão de dados 
As inspeções regulares permitem-lhe analisar e comparar os resultados de desempenho ao longo da vida-útil do ativo e de toda o seu portfolio solar. 
Normalize os seus dados 
As Imagens aéreas são capturadas de acordo com as normas IEC e com as diretrizes de boas práticas em todo o seu portfolio solar 
Apoio nas reclamações de garantias 
Comece a contruir um registo digital dos dados históricos, ajudando-o a compreender a taxa de falha dos módulos. Ter acesso a dados históricos, de alta qualidade, pode levar a uma reclamação de garantia bem sucedida no futuro. 
Os dados térmicos da mais alta qualidade 
A Above, pode capturar uma imagem térmica de cada módulo até a um nível celular, de acordo com a norma IEC. A nossa metodologia de normalização patenteada permite-nos recolher os dados de forma precisa. A garantia de qualidade é realizada por um termógrafo de nível 1, de acordo as normas ISO 18436 enquanto trabalha com processos ISO 9001:2015.
Imagens de Alta-Definição 
Above recolhe imagens de alta-definição ao mesmo tempo que recolhe os dados térmicos, permitindo uma identificação visual precisa e fiável da causa raiz.
Plataforma idealizada para dados de instalações fotovoltaicas 
Os relatórios de inspeção do SolarGain estão repletos de informação e de dados que lhe dão a capacidade de agir sobre os resultados. Recolha, analise e visualize todos os seus dados de inspeção, num único local. Priorize o seu trabalho identificando os Ativos mais críticos do seu portfolio e compreenda o verdadeiro estado de cada Ativo.
Compare dados históricos de inspeção 
Compare múltiplos relatórios de inspeção, utilizando diferentes níveis de visualização. Compreenda a evolução do estado de cada módulo e identifique tendências e correlações nos seus dados térmicos.
Crie listas interativas a partir dos seus relatórios 
Construa listas de tarefas específicas a partir do seu último relatório de Inspeção Termográfica e de Alta-Definição. Partilhe facilmente o conjunto de dados personalizados com terceiros. Acompanhe o progresso da resolução de cada anomalia, permitindo às suas equipas de campo resolver as anomalias e adicionar causas raiz no terreno.
Modelo avançado de Perda de Produção 
Concebido numa colaboração com o principal centro de investigação da E.U. – C.R.E.S.T, esta ferramenta demonstra de forma única o impacto combinado das anomalias térmicas dos módulos na sua instalação. Utilizando a concepção do seu sistema elétrico, fornecemos uma estimativa instantânea do rendimento e da perda de rendimentos associados às anomalias térmicas dos módulos.
Características do relatório SolarGain
Portfolio Dashboard 
Visualizar os relatórios num Smartphone 
Dados elétricos e espaciais mapeados 
Sistema de filtragem avançada de anomalias 
Definir a causa raiz 
Estado de Resolução de Anomalias

Construction Management Solution
La supervisión periódica de la construcción mediante drones proporciona a su equipo información precisa de alto nivel sobre el progreso cuantitativo de la obra y cualquier desviación geoespacial respecto al diseño.
Al mismo tiempo, su equipo realiza un seguimiento y controla la calidad de la construcción desde el suelo mediante la aplicación móvil EyeSite de Above. Conecte eficazmente el trabajo de campo y la supervisión de la construcción desde la oficina, también cuando trabaje con terceros.
Las herramientas de compartición digitales y analógicas mejoran la facilidad para informar a las partes interesadas.
Junto con las pruebas de inspección de la puesta en marcha y los números de serie que corresponden exactamente a los componentes físicos, este rico registro de datos prepara su activo para una transición sin problemas a la vida operativa.

Construction Management Solution
Il monitoraggio regolare dei lavori con droni fornisce al vostro team una visione precisa e di alto livello sull’avanzamento quantitativo della costruzione e su qualsiasi deviazione dal piano di costruzione geospaziale.
Contemporaneamente, il vostro team segue e controlla la qualità della costruzione da terra utilizzando l’applicazione mobile EyeSite di Above. Collegare in modo efficiente il lavoro sul campo e la supervisione della costruzione in ufficio, anche quando si lavora con terzi.
Gli strumenti di condivisione digitale e analogica migliorano la facilità di reporting alle parti interessate.
Insieme ai test di ispezione per la fase di commissioning e ai numeri di serie che corrispondono esattamente ai componenti fisici, questo importante archivio di dati prepara il vostro impianto ad una transizione verso la fase di operazione.

Construction Management Solution
Le suivi régulier de la construction par drone fournit à votre équipe des informations précises et de haut niveau sur l’avancement quantitatif de la construction et sur tout écart par rapport au plan de construction géospatial.
Simultanément, votre équipe suit et contrôle la qualité de la construction depuis le sol grâce à l’application mobile EyeSite d’Above. Reliez efficacement le travail sur le terrain et la supervision de la construction au bureau, même lorsque vous travaillez avec des tiers.
Les outils de partage numériques et analogiques facilitent la rédaction des rapports destinés aux parties prenantes
Avec les tests d’inspection de mise en service et les numéros de série correspondant précisément aux composants physiques, ce riche registre de données prépare votre actif à une transition en douceur vers la vie opérationnelle.

Inspección termográfica de alta definición
Above fue pionera en el uso de la termografía aérea en la industria solar y sigue siendo el líder de la industria hoy en día. Above es conocido por nuestra atención a los detalles y por la capacidad de detectar anomalías térmicas en los módulos solares fotovoltaicos hasta un nivel celular. La alta definición termográfica y visual de Above es una solución rentable y de tiempo mínimo para detectar problemas de rendimiento. Above posee patentes que aseguran que nuestras inspecciones dan resultados precisos y de alta calidad. Nuestra plataforma para clientes, SolarGain, muestra los resultados de la inspección dentro de un tablero general, un mapa geoespacial interactivo y una lista de anomalías filtrables.
Una visión completa de la salud de los activos hasta un nivel celular
Precisión de datos 
Las inspecciones termográficas de Above le permiten analizar y comparar los resultados de rendimiento durante la vida del activo y en todo su portafolio. 
Estandarice sus datos 
Imágenes aéreas realizadas según las normas IEC y las directrices de mejores prácticas en toda su portafolio solar. 
Apoyo a las reclamaciones de garantía 
Empieza a construir un hilo digital de datos históricos para ayudarte a entender la tasa de fallos del módulo. Tener acceso a datos históricos de alta calidad puede llevar a una reclamación de garantía más exitosa en el futuro. 
Electricamente y espacialmente cartografiada 
Los datos de su inspección aérea se cartografían eléctrica y espacialmente hasta la ubicación exacta en la plataforma SolarGain. 
El modelo de pérdida de energía más avanzado de la industria 
Diseñado en colaboración con el centro de investigación académica líder C.R.E.S.T., esta herramienta demuestra de manera única el impacto combinado de las anomalías térmicas de los módulos utilizando el diseño de su sistema eléctrico. 
Construye partes de averias a partir de sus informes 
Cree y comparta fácilmente una lista de tareas procesables con los contratistas, directamente, desde su informe termográfico de SolarGain. 
Comparar los informes históricos 
Compare multiple inspection reports within a series of data visualisations. Our intelligent tool connects the dots between your data releasing precious resource time to identify persistent and evolving thermal anomalies. 
Captura de datos de alta calidad
Above puede capturar una imagen de alta definición conforme a la IEC y una imagen térmica de cada módulo hasta un nivel celular.
Above can capture an IEC-compliant high-definition image and thermal image of every module down to a cellular level. Our patented normalisation methodology enables us to collect the most accurate data available. Quality assurance is carried out by a level 1 thermographer to ISO 18436 standards whilst working with ISO 9001:2015 processes.
Imágenes de presentación aérea
Con cada inspección, capturamos una fotografía aérea del lugar que puede ser utilizada en materiales de marketing y como una forma de identificar el lugar.
Informe termográfico de SolarGain
Los informes de inspección de SolarGain están llenos datos que le proporciona información de gran utilidad.
SolarGain Pro
Nuestra plataforma de clientes SolarGain es una plataforma líder en la industria que ofrece informes de inspección aérea inteligentes. SolarGain mantiene los datos de inspección y pruebas dentro de una plataforma unificada que proporciona una visión holística de la salud de su activo. SolarGain le da acceso a una visión procesable del rendimiento de su activo. Permitiéndole correlacionar y transformar los datos de inspección y pruebas, en decisiones informadas.
